participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, enjoys music and socializing.
participant_1.background: My horse never talks back to me. I live in the city. I am still a student, but I am gonna be a nurse. I am the lead singer for an indie band.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Confident yet self-critical, enjoys fitness and beauty.
participant_2.background: Many people want to be my friend. I like makeup. I love to exercise. I am not a nice person. I have a nice smile.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_2. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to sing, ride horses, and go to the gym.
I like to exercise too, but I'm not very good at it.
That's okay, everyone starts somewhere! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to pop and hip hop.
Me too! I love going to concerts. Have you ever been to any?
I've been to a few, but not very many. I'm not really a huge fan of crowds.
I can understand that. I like going to concerts with a small group of friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm sure you have a great time.
I do! I love singing and dancing at concerts. It's so much fun to let loose and be yourself.
That's awesome! I wish I was more like you.
You can be! Just go out and have some fun. You don't have to be perfect.
Good! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
